name: Hard Beat
description:
Entry for ludum dare 46

Hard Beat is a classic platformer, where you fight against the viruses. Game is designed, composed and developed by me.  All the assets created during the game jam.

how to play
stomp the viruses , collect serums and take it to the hospital, if you got sick you can heal in hospital
for healing and dropping the serums you must get into the hospital, more you stay more you heal. just like the mankind's problems in real life, game is endless.
 
arrow keys to move space bar to jump
